summary: A/C CONDENSER WENT.  GM HAS NOT ISSUED A RECALL.  THERE IS A NATIONAL BACK ORDER ON THE RE-DESIGNED CONDENSER.  PEOPLE ARE BEING FORCED TO WAIT MONTHS AND ARE GOING WITHOUT A/C.  GM CLAIMS THAT THEY ARE AWARE AND ARE WORKING WITH TWO MANUFACTURERS TO GET THE NEW PART MADE AND SHIPPED TO DEALERS.  PLEASE SEE DOCUMENTATION OF CHAT SESSION WITH GM REP.
